swag: You con dey diet... you wan become Methuselah, ya nuh ready to die yet... A hundred and fifty years is nuh too much - and dat is ur target!
author: Magnito

swag: You con dey look fresh... everybody wey know you before don dey envy you small small
author: De-paule

swag: You buy Amazon, buy eBay put, con dey feel like a mogul... even Jumia boss sef dey famz you make u sha buy am
author: De-paule

swag: You too dey feel fly... nothing is impossible, you convince Beyonce to divorce Jay-z
author: De-paule

swag: You no go your own wedding... you too busy, business here-and-there, even ur bae can relate, your father-in-law still call you good boy as you dash am Givenchy
author: De-paule

swag: You become small-Jesus, nothing dey vex you again, you don ice ur temper... person bash your new Range, u tell am 'no problem, no one is above mistake'
author: De-paule

swag: Kim Kardashian divorce Kanye become your side-chick
author: IFE

swag: Dangote dey famz you for contract
author: IFE

swag: Na soso hundred dollar paper be your toilet roll
author: IFE

swag: You chase Buhari commot Aso rock con put your washman
author: IFE

swag: Queen of England turn your nanny
author: IFE

swag: You dey enter yankee without visa
author: IFE
